News

In the center of Penza, a cab on the sidewalk became a pedestrian barrier

On Saturday, 27 January, in the center of Penza, on Kirova Street, the cab driver was stuck on the sidewalk.

The cardio centre from Saratova delivered a baby with a heart condition.

In the pencil cardio centre of the perinatal centre of Saratov, the reactivation brigade of the sanitary aircraft delivered a 35-day newborn with a heart condition.
27.01.2024

Penzens called in the cold to keep their fingers, faces and ears


Hands and legs, cheeks, chin, ears and noses are most likely to be frozen. This has been reported at the P.P.S. Department.
27.01.2024

In Russia, the number of imported eggs was revealed


Since the beginning of January 2024, a total of 60.7 million eggs have been imported into Russia. Turkey, Azerbaijan and Belarus have been the main suppliers of these products, and they disclose such data to Praim, with reference to the Rosselhzhor.
27.01.2024

In Russia, the mayor called on men to sneak up on their wives to grow birth.


The mayor of the innocent, Michael Minenkov, invited men living in the city to sneak up on their wives to raise their fertility. He placed his post in his Telegram-chanal.
27.01.2024

The man gave up the drug and hypnotized himself during surgery.


The Swiss citizen hypnotized himself instead of a drug addict, so he wouldn't feel pain during surgery. The Sun reports.
27.01.2024

Penzens may disconnect the telephone with three months of silence.


From 1 September 2024, telephone services will be provided under new regulations. According to RIA News, Prime Minister Michael Mischustin signed the order.
27.01.2024

In the Ghost of the Ghost Party called for animators to work


The first Co-Chair of the Committee of the State of Culture, Alexander Shalokhov, called on the party ' s leading and blogers, Anastasia Ivleeva, to work in DC. He shared his opinion with a newS.ru.
27.01.2024

It's the most unsuitable time for sleep.


Caranne Raj's surgeon called a period between three and four o'clock this morning the most unsuitable time to go to sleep. The doctor's words are published by HuffPost.
27.01.2024

In Penza, slices of "Blocked bread" were distributed to the memory of the Leningrads.


On Saturday, 27 January, the Penza celebrated the 80-year anniversary of the total liberation of Leningrad from the fascist blockade during the Great Patriotic War.
27.01.2024

The authorities commented on the threat of " X disease " to Rossians


The X disease is not a threat to the Rosians because the health system in the country is ready for it after the coronavirus pandemic.
27.01.2024

In the cityside, two cosuls went to the road without fear


A paranoid wild animal hit a video camera in the cityside. The tape on which the rotary coles float in the snow, the presence of a man, appeared in the Network.
27.01.2024

How long does unemployment benefit pay?


She's been unemployed for a long time, and she's all paid a benefit. If I get on the record, how long will I pay?
27.01.2024

In Russia, a medical commissioner was simplified


Prime Minister Mikhail Misustin signed a decree on the simplified procedure for the medical commission for Russians who voluntarily enter military service under contract. The TAS reports.
27.01.2024

The incidence of COVID-19, influenza and RWI decreased in Zarenus


From 19 to 25 January, there was a 2.1-fold decline in morbidity in Zarčn compared with the previous week, outside hospital pneumonia by 2.25 times, influenza and RWI by 13.5 per cent.
27.01.2024

In Penza, a Lada Largus driver was looking for an accident.


On Friday, 26 January, a road traffic accident occurred at Penza near the Metro City TC on the Karpinsky Street. He was video-recorded by a crash vehicle.
27.01.2024

The boy stripped his mother 170,000 roubles by wearing a promocode to the game.


The trusted young man of Penza listed a large amount of fraud from his mother's map.
27.01.2024

Drivers want to lose their license for up to one and a half years to cover the number.


The Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia proposes to deprive drivers of their rights for a period of up to one and a half years for the concealment of vehicle numbers by means of special means.
27.01.2024

Vadim Supikov met with bloc veterans.


On Friday, 26 January, on the eve of the commemorative date, the day of the complete lifting of the blockade of Leningrad, President of the Legislative Assembly of the Penza Region, Vadim Supik, visited the tragic events of the 1941-1945 war.
26.01.2024

On 27 January, there is no need for the pencils to remove their shovels.


On Saturday, 27 January, there's a cloud weather and a little wet snow waiting in the Penzen region.
26.01.2024

Diesel lost the Petroleum Account at 2:4


On Friday, 26 January, the Penzen " Diesel " in Almetevska lost the local crew of the Neftjanik. The meeting was part of the regular High hockey League championship.
26.01.2024

Prison police officers solved 61.5% of the crimes for the year


At the Department of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Penza region, the results of the work for the year were summarized. In 2023, 61.5 per cent of the crimes were solved. According to Major General Paula Gavrilin, this is one of the highest levels in the Pwilgian Federal District.
26.01.2024

In Lower Lomov, the driver failed to show his rights and was arrested.


In Lower Lomov, a Toliatti driver didn't want to present a driving permit and was arrested. His car didn't have a registration plate.
26.01.2024

What do you mean, and how do you spell the word "neodomek"?


Everyone's talking about the news, and he's got a snack. What do you mean by the word and how to write it right?
26.01.2024

The penis complained about a pack of dogs in school No. 28.


Penns continue to complain about a bunch of homeless dogs walking around the streets of town. On Friday, 26 January, Natalia S. sent a video to the PenzaInform web site, in which the palaces penetrated school No. 28 on Krasnov.
26.01.2024

At Penza, bus No. 82s was in an accident with Nivia.


At Penza on Friday, 26 January, bus No. 82s ran into Nova. The photo and the video from the scene of the accident appeared in the Network.
26.01.2024

A resident of the Kamen district drove drunk and lost his car


In the Kamen district, a non-resident local resident without the right to drive and paid. His car was confiscated.
26.01.2024

Chief Penza said he'd change in the Belinsky Park.


Head Penza Alexander Basenko presented on his homepage in the social media how the upgrading of the Belinsky Park will continue this year.
26.01.2024

The bailiffs removed the leave of the Sinoborska


A 45-year-old citizen of Sinoborska took his family on car leave and couldn't cross the border. There was no rest because of the bailiffs responsible for their work.
26.01.2024

The people of Sputnik were given a winter fire show.


The inhabitants of the Satellite City have a tradition of accepting spontaneous gifts from the Termodom. The microreion developer thinks not only about housing, but also about the comfort of the thousands of people living in the Satellite.
26.01.2024

In the Penze, two sites will be run by the Blocked bread.


On Saturday, 27 January, the Penza will join the entire Russian commemoration of the Blocal bread, dedicated to the Day of complete release of Leningrad from the fascist blockade during the Great Patriotic War.
26.01.2024

Russia and Ukraine exchanged the bodies of the martyrs ' death to the SSS.


Russia and Ukraine exchanged the bodies of military personnel killed in a special military operation (SSA). This was reported by a deputy, Ghosduma Shamsail Saraliev, in an interview with the BCRC.
26.01.2024

The terrier Archie was reunited with the owner


The police found the " frozen " of Archie's terrier in the city of Serpuhova and handed him over to his master. The video of the meetings in Telegram was published by Irina Volk, official representative of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia.
26.01.2024

In the Russian village, they noticed that they were knocked into their homes asking for help from separated men.


In the village of the Mesen Sverdlovsk region, two dispersed and bosomed men were spotted on the street who knocked into their homes and asked for help, but no one opened them. A local woman told me about this in a conversation with EAN.
26.01.2024

In the Russian city, five cats turned on a stove and set fire.


In Ufa, five hungry cats had an induction stove and set fire at a multi-storey apartment. This is reported in the Telegram-Canal of the Russian MES.
